# reset-password

 
Directly connect to the database to reset a user's password


## Usage
```console
reset-password <username>
```


## Options
### --postgres-url
 
| | |
| --- | --- |
| Environment | <code>$CODER_PG_CONNECTION_URL</code> |

URL of a PostgreSQL database to connect to
